languages.text: Виде{mf|л|ла} Домин среди них карту Потерянного дитя, что утратило корни свои, и опору свою, но таит в себе скрытое до поры обещание обрести их однажды.
Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.
languages.original_text: Виде{mf|л|ла} Домин среди них карту Потерянного дитя, что утратило корни свои, и опору свою, но таит в себе скрытое до поры обещание обрести их однажды.

traits.locale_text: Among them, the Enim saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her a yet-unrevealed promise of recovering them someday.
Among them, the Enim saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her a yet-unrevealed promise of recovering them someday.
Among them, the Enim saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.
Among them, the Enim saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.
Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.
Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.

languages.text: Unter ihnen sah {mf|der|die} Domin die Karte des verlorenen Kindes, das seiner Wurzeln und seines Umfelds beraubt wurde, in sich aber die noch immer verborgene Saat des Versprechens trägt, sie eines Tages zurückzuerobern.
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.

traits.locale_text: Unter ihnen sah {mf|der|die} Domin die Karte des verlorenen Kindes, das seiner Wurzeln und seines Umfelds beraubt wurde, in sich aber die noch immer verborgene Saat des Versprechens trägt, sie eines Tages zurückzuerobern.

languages.text: Entre ellas, {mf|el|la} Domin vio la carta de la Niña Perdida, arrancada de sus raíces y apoyos, pero que alberga las semillas de la promesa de recuperarlo todo algún día.
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.

traits.locale_text: Entre ellas, {mf|el|la} Domin vio la carta de la Niña Perdida, arrancada de sus raíces y apoyos, pero que alberga las semillas de la promesa de recuperarlo todo algún día.

languages.text: ドミンはその中に、自身のルーツと支えから引き裂かれたものの、いつかそれを取り戻すという約束の種をいまだ隠し持つ、失われた子供のカードを見た。
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.

traits.locale_text: ドミンはその中に、自身のルーツと支えから引き裂かれたものの、いつかそれを取り戻すという約束の種をいまだ隠し持つ、失われた子供のカードを見た。

languages.text: 在无数圣牌之中，秘者看到了迷失孩童的圣牌。尽管她被连根拔起，失去了她的支柱，但她灵魂深处依然隐藏着应许的种子。总有一天，她将会找回失去的一切。
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.

traits.locale_text: 在无数圣牌之中，秘者看到了迷失孩童的圣牌。尽管她被连根拔起，失去了她的支柱，但她灵魂深处依然隐藏着应许的种子。总有一天，她将会找回失去的一切。

languages.text: {mf|Le|La} Domin vit la carte de l'Enfant perdue, arrachée à ses racines et à son soutien, mais qui porte en elle l'espoir encore caché de les retrouver un jour.
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le|La} Domin vit la carte de l'Enfant perdue, arrachée à ses racines et à son soutien, mais qui porte en elle l'espoir encore caché de les retrouver un jour.

languages.text: Domin, kartların arasında Kayıp Çocuk'u gördü. O ki köklerinden ve desteklerinden koparılandır. O ki buna rağmen bir gün geri alacağı bir vaadin tohumlarını içinde hâlâ gizli kapaklı taşıyandır.
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Lost Child, who was torn from her roots and her support, but carries within her the still-hidden seeds of a promise to recover them someday.
